casebody.data:
James Russell LIZZIO, an Individual, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Stefany Miley, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Carlos Chavez-Belmonte, an Individual, Real Party in Interest. No. 78672 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JUNE 17, 2019
